document_data.name: ''Dart of Pinning''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Darts of pinning''''' were large needle-shaped [[enchanted]] [[dart]]s designed to restrain rather than kill.
document_data.Powers: ''Darts of pinning'' were enhanced with a ''+2'' enchantment and held magics that paralyzed the darts' targets. Once a ''dart of pinning'' reached its target it struck them motionless as if affected by the [[carrion crawler brain juice]] or ''[[hold monster]]'' spell.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''darts of pinning'' could be found in [[Thar]] and the [[Moonsea]] region and wielded by agents of the [[Zhentarim]].
